name: TEKConn
description:
TEKConn specializes in providing business-focused IT consulting and IT support solutions for small to mid-sized organizations in the New York Tri-State Area. It's mission is to empower clients to be successful, by leveraging technology in order to help achieve their business goals. Â TEKConn, has been named to the MSPmentor 200 and Inc. 5000 lists in the past three years.
"TEKConn's focus is on helping our clients succeed and achieve their goals by leveraging their investment in technology. Our commitment to them is to provide unrivaled customer service, to keep their people productive and their businesses ahead of the competition," said TEKConn Vice President Stephen Dike.
Across many industries, we are our clients' trusted, outsourced IT department.
